Class ComputerInput

java.lang.Object
ComputerInput
public class ComputerInput extends Object
Generates computer inputs for ship and grenade positions in the Battleship game. It can operate independently or consider player inputs to avoid overlapping positions.

  • Method Details

    • loopingLogic

      private void loopingLogic(PlayerInput pInput, String[] positionsOfShipsAndGrenade, int startOfLoop, int endOfLoop)
      Logic to generate and validate positions for ships and grenades.
      Parameters:
      pInput - PlayerInput object for comparison to avoid overlap.
      positionsOfShipsAndGrenade - Array to hold generated positions.
      startOfLoop - Starting index for ship or grenade position generation.
      endOfLoop - Ending index for ship or grenade position generation.

    • checkUsedCoordinatesForComputer

      protected boolean checkUsedCoordinatesForComputer(String[] pInputString, String[] positionsOfShipsAndGrenade, String valueOfShip)
      Checks if a generated coordinate for the computer overlaps with any previously set positions.
      Parameters:
      pInputString - Positions set by the player.
      positionsOfShipsAndGrenade - Current positions set by the computer.
      valueOfShip - The newly generated position to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the position overlaps, false otherwise.
